source.9c6f0837:
df=pd.read_csv("../input/usarrests/USArrests.csv").copy()
df.index = df.iloc[:,0]
df = df.iloc[:,1:5]
df.index.name = None
df.head()
source.4c95ab4d:
from scipy.cluster.hierarchy import linkage
hc_complete = linkage(df, "complete")
hc_average = linkage(df, "average")
hc_single = linkage(df, "single")
source.11bb0cb1:
from scipy.cluster.hierarchy import dendrogram

plt.figure(figsize=(15, 10))
plt.title('Hierarchical clustering - Dendrogram')
plt.xlabel('Index')
plt.ylabel('Distance')
dendrogram(
    hc_complete,
    leaf_font_size=10
);
source.37912dd5:
from scipy.cluster.hierarchy import dendrogram

plt.figure(figsize=(15, 10))
plt.title('HHierarchical clustering - Dendrogram')
plt.xlabel('Cardinality')
plt.ylabel('Distance')
dendrogram(
    hc_complete,
    truncate_mode = "lastp",
    p = 4,                       #for 4 clusters
    show_contracted = True
);

from sklearn.cluster import AgglomerativeClustering
Cluster=AgglomerativeClustering(n_clusters=4, affinity="euclidean",linkage="ward")   #We indicated that 4 is more preferable
